template1:
Dear Julian,

With the new budget, we can print greater quantities of some of our content pieces in the next quarter. We'll also be able to display large-format advertisements wherever we see fit.

We put together some ideas for content during your vacation and would like to start planning. Could you take a look at the suggestions and get back to me no later than this afternoon with your feedback?

[Malicious Link]

Best,
James
german1:
Lieber Heinrich,

bezugnehmend auf undseren letzten Austausch schicke ich Dir die neue Fassung des Manuskripts: [Malicious link]

Mit herzlichen Grüßen
Manfred

paypal:
Dear John Doe,

Your PayPal account has been limited, You have 24 hours to solve the problem or your account will be permanently disabled.

We are sorry to inform you that you no longer have access to PayPal's advantages like purchesing, and sending and receiving money.

Why is my PayPal account limited?
We believe that someone may have used your account without your knowledge.

What to do next?
Please click the link below to verify your account and remove the limitation.

[Verify your account]{malicious link}

Thank you for your understanding,
The PayPal team
